author: terencechain
content:

author: ralexstokes
content: i took a look, the extra data all points to titan or rsync builders

author: tersec
content: still no public or any other postmortem at least I've seen from the previous round yet. maybe, just perhaps, the confidence stated that don't worry, the optimistic approach is fine, it will never happen, was slightly misplaced?

author: ralexstokes
content: i _think_ we have tracked down the blob issues w/ mev-boost system so far after talking to some of the relay teams, ill push for a post-mortem on this
